name: BlueprintAI
description: Web to Figma - Full stack page capture and import

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd chrome-extension && npm install && cd ../figma-plugin && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:extension && npm run build:plugin
scripts.clean:extension: rm -rf chrome-extension/dist chrome-extension/node_modules/.cache node_modules/.cache && rm -f chrome-extension/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
